title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 541.14 - Patients committed prior to september 1, 1980
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 541.14 - Patients committed prior to september 1, 1980

State Regulations

Each facility shall, prior to September 1, 1981, apply for
either a release order or a retention order, whichever is appropriate, for each
patient committed to the custody of the commissioner prior to September 1, 1980
after having been found not guilty by reason of mental disease or defect. The
procedures for review of applications for release orders or retention orders
described in this Part shall be followed prior to such
applications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
541.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
